entry.title: DW -- Reporting WorldSkills
entry.summary:
When the world meets to show its industrial might, it meets for a competition.
This week, Lyon hosted the 47th WorldSkills – a competition of workers aged 21 and younger. 70 countries fight to win titles in bakery, plumbing and heating, and 3D game design among a full set of 59 skills.
